title: type design
content:
this is my first crack at this

this was intended just for a logotype but just want to get your guys feed back

any suggestions that could improve the look of this would be much appreciate! considering doing the full alphabet

thanks  
b

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [allnewends.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825021744/http:/typophile.com/files/allnewends.pdf) | 44.67 KB |
author: djbaz

comments.content: It could work, but you need to watch the weight of the letters and keep them balanced.
These particular letters lend themselves more to the treatment than others might. Start sketching with letters like H, T, X to see if it will work.
